titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2143) to make the repeal of the estate tax permanent.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-494, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 168.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 435.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 223 - 201 (Roll no. 215).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 227 - 195 (Roll No. 216).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/5/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R. 2143 (making the estate tax repeal permanent).
